TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract WeakEventManager extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public MustInherit Class WeakEventManager Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: 為「弱式事件模式」中所使用的事件管理員提供基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for the event manager that is used in the *weak event pattern*.

summary.span: 管理員會針對也使用該模式的事件 (或回呼) 加入或移除接聽程式。

span.span: The manager adds and removes listeners for events (or callbacks) that also use the pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件來源的物件存留期無關的事件接聽程式時，通常使用弱式事件模式。You typically use the weak event pattern when the event source has an object lifetime that is independent of the event listeners. 使用中央事件分派功能讓接聽程式的處理常式，即使來源物件仍然存在回收。Using the central event dispatching capability of a allows the listener's handlers to be garbage collected even if the source object persists. 相反地，一般事件的連結使用`+=`運算子會使可能中斷連接的來源，以保存到接聽程式的參考。By contrast, a regular event hookup using the `+=` operator causes the potentially disconnected source to hold a reference to the listeners. 這樣可避免進行記憶體回收能夠及時收件者。This prevents the receiver from being garbage collected in a timely fashion. 一個常見的情形，存留期之間的關聯性來源和接聽程式應該使用弱式事件模式的已更新來自資料繫結的事件處理。One common situation where the lifetime relationships between sources and listeners should use of the weak event pattern is the handling of update events coming from data bindings. 弱式事件模式也會用於回呼事件及一般事件中。The weak event pattern can also be used for callbacks and regular events.

para.span: 如需自訂的範例，請參閱[弱式事件模式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/weak-event-patterns.md)。

span.span: For an example of a custom , see [Weak Event Patterns](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/weak-event-patterns.md).

summary.span: 將受管理的事件傳遞給每一個接聽程式。

span.span: Delivers the event being managed to each listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法內加入或移除的事件處理常式和子類別的實作。Call the method from within the event handlers that are added or removed by the and implementations of subclasses. 如果您呼叫方法在您`AddListener`類別的實作，接收事件的接聽程式的清單就會保留在基礎的集合。If you call the method in your `AddListener` implementation of your class, the list of listeners receiving the event is kept in an underlying collection. (`AddListener`不是類別或介面合約的一部分。(`AddListener` is not part of an interface or class contract. `AddListener` 是呼叫您管理員類別的方法的建議的名稱，並將事件的弱式事件模式接聽程式。)`AddListener` is the suggested name for the method of your manager class that calls and adds weak event pattern listeners for the event.) 將接聽程式加入至單一清單。 adds listeners to a single list. 如果您的管理員實作會維護多個 list 的每個事件接聽程式，請勿使用或。If your manager implementation maintains more than one list of listeners per event, do not use or . 相反地，您的實作應該建立自己執行個體，`AddListener`應該將接聽程式新增至適當的清單中，並且事件應該傳遞至適當的接聽程式清單，藉由呼叫。Instead, your implementation should create its own instances, `AddListener` should add listeners to the appropriate list, and events should be delivered to the appropriate listener list by calling .

summary.span: 將受管理的事件傳遞給所提供清單中的每一個接聽程式。

span.span: Delivers the event being managed to each listener in the provided list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法時需要管理員實作會維護個別的接聽程式會根據事件資料中所擷取的資訊。This method is necessary if your manager implementation maintains separate listeners lists based on information that is captured in the event data. 如果您使用這個進階的技巧，您必須建立並維護個別的清單，做為您的管理員實作的一部分，而且您必須提供特定的清單中加入接聽程式。If you use this advanced technique, you must create and maintain the separate lists as part of your manager implementation, and you must provide a way to add listeners to a specific list. 未經處理的事件接聽程式處理常式實作必須做在發生狀況時，您用來區分清單，以及將事件傳遞僅對適當的清單或清單。Your handler implementation that listens to the raw event must act upon the condition that you use to differentiate the lists, and deliver the event only to the appropriate list or lists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別可以選擇哪些資料和儲存在這個索引子的型別。Derived classes can choose what data and type to store in this indexer. 通常這會實作為，這是弱式參考到接聽程式的清單。Typically this is implemented as a , which is a list of weak references to listeners. 您只需要變更此類型，如果類型不能包含您所需的資訊。You would only have to change this type if the type cannot contain your required information. 因此，您必須覆寫如果方法，讓所有的清除作業的基礎類型會正確執行。If so, you will have to override the method so that all cleanup of the underlying type is performed correctly.

summary.span: 將提供的接聽程式加入至所提供的受管理事件來源。

span.span: Adds the provided listener to the provided source for the event being managed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 管理員類別中呼叫這個方法`AddListener`方法實作。Call this method within your manager class `AddListener` methods on implementations. `AddListener` 這是建議的名稱定義您管理員的類別，讓其他類別加入您的弱式事件模式的接聽程式上的靜態方法。`AddListener` is the suggested name for the static method you define on your manager class to enable other classes to add a listener for your weak event pattern. `AddListener` 應該採用兩個參數：`source`其中附加接聽程式，而`listener`執行個體。`AddListener` should take two parameters: the `source` where the listener is attached, and the `listener` instance. 針對您`AddListener`實作，請呼叫上目前的管理員和傳遞相同的兩個參數的方法。For your `AddListener` implementation, call the method on the current manager and pass the same two parameters. 如果接聽程式的清單是先前空白，呼叫方法就內部而言，這會呼叫您的特定覆寫透過多型。If the list of listeners was previously empty, calls the method internally, which will call your specific override through polymorphism. 將接聽程式加入至單一內部每`source`。 adds listeners to a single internal per `source`. 如果您的管理員實作會維護每個事件來源組合的接聽程式的多個清單，請勿使用。If your manager implementation maintains more than one list of listeners for each event-source combination, do not use . 相反地，您的實作應該建立自己執行個體，`AddListener`應該將接聽程式新增至適當的清單中，並且事件應該傳遞至適當的接聽程式清單，藉由呼叫事件，而不是方法。Instead, your implementation should create its own instances, `AddListener` should add listeners to the appropriate list, and events should be delivered to the appropriate listener list by calling the event instead of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 管理員類別中呼叫這個方法`RemoveListener`方法實作。Call this method within your manager class `RemoveListener` methods on implementations. `RemoveListener` 這是建議的名稱定義在您管理員的類別，讓其他類別移除接聽程式的弱式事件模式的靜態方法。`RemoveListener` is the suggested name for the static method you define on your manager class to enable other classes to remove a listener for your weak event pattern. `RemoveListener` 應該採用兩個參數：`source`其中已移除接聽程式，而`listener`類別。`RemoveListener` should take two parameters: the `source` where the listener is removed, and the `listener` class. 針對您`RemoveListener`實作，請呼叫上目前的管理員和傳遞相同的兩個參數的方法。For your `RemoveListener` implementation, call the method on the current manager and pass the same two parameters. 如果呼叫在清單中，移除最後一個接聽程式呼叫方法就內部而言，這會呼叫您的特定覆寫透過多型。If a call to removes the last listener in the list, calls the method internally, which will call your specific override through polymorphism. 移除接聽程式從內部單一每`source`。 removes listeners from a single internal per `source`. 如果您的管理員實作會維護每個事件來源組合的接聽程式的多個清單，請勿使用。If your manager implementation maintains more than one list of listeners for each event-source combination, do not use . 相反地，您的實作應該建立自己執行個體，`RemoveListener`應該從適當的清單，移除接聽程式，以及事件應傳遞至適當的接聽程式清單，藉由呼叫方法，而非方法。Instead, your implementation should create its own instances, `RemoveListener` should remove listeners from the appropriate list, and events should be delivered to the appropriate listener list by calling the method instead of the method.

summary.span: 在基礎資料表上建立讀取鎖定，並傳回 。

span.span: Establishes a read-lock on the underlying data table, and returns an .

value.span: 物件，可用來在資料表成員上建立鎖定，然後以 建構適當處置。

span.span: An object that can be used to establish a lock on the data table members and then be appropriately disposed with a construct.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別中，查詢中所包含的資料表應該一律在內發生`using (ReadLock) { ... }`子句，除了已寫入鎖定內的查詢。In derived classes, queries to the table contained in should always occur within a `using (ReadLock) { ... }` clause, except for queries that are already within a write lock. 這些查詢可能會需要您的類別支援更複雜`AddListener`實作，需要更多的資料超過`source`和`listener`，並使用儲存額外的資訊集合。These queries may be necessary if your class supports a more sophisticated `AddListener` implementation that requires more data beyond the `source` and the `listener`, and uses the collection to store the extra information.

summary.span: 要求在較低優先權執行緒上執行基礎接聽程式清單中未使用項目的清除動作。

span.span: Requests that a purge of unused entries in the underlying listener list be performed on a lower priority thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法是類似於呼叫方法在目前的管理員清單中，在較低的執行緒優先順序上與`purgeAll`參數設定為`false`。Calling the method is similar to calling the method on the current manager's list, at lower thread priority, with the `purgeAll` parameter set to `false`.

value.span: 物件，可用來在資料表成員上建立鎖定，然後以 建構適當處置。

span.span: An object that can be used to establish a lock on the data table members and then be appropriately disposed with a construct.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別中，基礎資料表的所有修改都會內應該都發生`using (WriteLock) { ... }`子句。In derived classes, all modifications to the underlying data table should occur within a `using (WriteLock) { ... }` clause. 這些修改可能有必要，如果您的類別支援更複雜`AddListener`實作，需要更多的資料超過`source`和`listener`，並使用儲存額外的資訊集合。These modifications may be necessary if your class supports a more sophisticated `AddListener` implementation that requires more data beyond the `source` and the `listener`, and uses the collection to store the extra information.
